name: Prodigy Tactics
summary: Enter the arena with a team of heroes. Fight hand in hand with Guardians and vanquish your opponents in this tactical, turn-based game - featuring a range of characters with a unique abilities on a mission to restore the peace in a fantastic world of Thasys.
info:
• 游戏类型: RPG
  • 发行日期: 2018年9月28日
  • 开发: Hanakai Studio
  • 发行: Forever Entertainment S. A. Play
